item.title: My Path Through the World of Investing
item.description: When I was 17, I was an avid fan of a Youtube channel called Teaching Men’s Fashion, or TMF. It was a style channel, with some self-improvement tips and whatnot. For a dorky teenager like I was, it was a lifesaver (although now I question a lot of my life choices regarding why I even liked that). Even though the channel was mainly regarding fashion and grooming, in one video they talked about how one of their favorite channels was from a guy called Graham Stephan.
